statements: SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT id, username, email FROM user_profiles;
SELECT id, email, phone FROM user_profiles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT username, phone FROM user_profiles ORDER BY phone DESC;
SELECT id, username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT username, phone, social_media_handles FROM user_profiles WHERE LENGTH(username) > 5 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT id, email, phone FROM user_profiles WHERE LENGTH(phone) >= 10 AND phone LIKE '1%';
SELECT id, username FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@domain.com' AND JSON_LENGTH(social_media_handles) > 1 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT full_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, birthday, city FROM user_profiles WHERE birthday < '1990-01-01';
SELECT handle_id, platform, handle FROM social_media_handles WHERE platform = 'Twitter';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE country = 'Canada' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT full_name, email, birthday FROM user_profiles WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY full_name ASC;

SELECT user_profiles.full_name, social_media_handles.platform FROM user_profiles LEFT JOIN social_media_handles ON user_profiles.user_id = social_media_handles.user_id WHERE user_profiles.city = 'New York';

SELECT user_profiles.full_name, user_profiles.birthday, social_media_handles.platform, social_media_handles.handle FROM user_profiles INNER JOIN social_media_handles ON user_profiles.user_id = social_media_handles.user_id WHERE user_profiles.country = 'Canada';

SELECT user_profiles.full_name, user_profiles.city, social_media_handles.platform FROM user_profiles LEFT JOIN social_media_handles ON user_profiles.user_id = social_media_handles.user_id WHERE user_profiles.birthday > '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM social_media_handles WHERE platform = 'Twitter';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM user_profiles ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM outreach_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM user_profiles WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT user_id, platform, handle FROM social_media_handles WHERE platform = 'Twitter';
SELECT * FROM outreach_campaigns WHERE budget > 1000;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM outreach_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM users;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM users ORDER BY last_name;
SELECT * FROM user_social_media WHERE platform='Twitter';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM users WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%' AND last_name LIKE 'D%';
SELECT u.first_name, c.campaign_name FROM users u INNER JOIN campaign_users cu ON u.user_id = cu.user_id INNER JOIN campaigns c ON cu.campaign_id = c.campaign_id WHERE cu.engagement_score > 50;
SELECT u.first_name, u.last_name, us.platform FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_social_media us ON u.user_id = us.user_id WHERE us.platform IS NULL;
SELECT MAX(engagement_score), MIN(engagement_score) FROM campaign_users WHERE campaign_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, age, location FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, location FROM users WHERE location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT u.username, s.handle FROM users u INNER JOIN social_media_handles s ON u.user_id = s.user_id WHERE s.platform = 'Twitter'
SELECT user_id, email, location FROM users ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT u.username, s.platform, s.handle FROM users u LEFT JOIN social_media_handles s ON u.user_id = s.user_id
